title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - OpenAI to Boost UK's AI Capabilities with Local Data Hosting
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.
content: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment ... [502 chars]

title: OpenAI launches Atlas browser to compete with Google Chrome
description: WASHINGTON, Oct 22: OpenAI introduced its own web browser, Atlas, on Tuesday, putting the ChatGPT maker in direct competition with Google as more internet users rely on artificial intelligence to answer their questions. Making its popular AI chatbot a gateway to online searches could allow OpenAI, the world’s most valuable startup, to pull in more internet traffic and the revenue made from digital advertising. It could also further cut off the lifeblood of online publishers if ChatGPT so effectively feeds […]
content:

title: OpenAI rolls out 'ChatGPT Atlas' for Mac users
description: NEW DELHI, Oct 22 : US-based Artificial Intelligence company OpenAI has launched ‘ChatGPT Atlas’, a new web browser built with ChatGPT at its core, according to an official blog. The blog said, ” Today we’re introducing ChatGPT Atlas, a new web browser built with ChatGPT at its core. AI gives us a rare moment to rethink what it means to use the web. Last year, we added search in ChatGPT so you could instantly find timely information from across the […]
content:
NEW DELHI, Oct 22 : US-based Artificial Intelligence company OpenAI has launched ‘ChatGPT Atlas’, a new web browser built with ChatGPT at its core, according to an official blog.

title: Prince Harry, Meghan join call for ban on development of AI 'superintelligence'
description: LONDON, Oct 22 : Prince Harry and his wife Meghan have joined prominent computer scientists, economists, artists, evangelical Christian leaders and American conservative commentators Steve Bannon and Glenn Beck to call for a ban on AI “superintelligence” that threatens humanity. The letter, released Wednesday by a politically and geographically diverse group of public figures, is squarely aimed at tech giants like Google, OpenAI and Meta Platforms that are racing each other to build a form of artificial intelligence designed to […]

title: Lam Research expects upbeat quarterly revenue on demand for chipmaking tools
description: Lam Research forecast second-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, as chipmakers ordered more of its equipment used to manufacture semiconductors for artificial intelligence applications.
content: Shares of the Fremont, California-based company rose 2.2% in trading after the bell. The stock has doubled so far this year, supported by strong demand for AI semiconductors as chip designers seek equipment to create processors capable of meeting gro... [1032 chars]

title: The downside of banning AI in mental health therapy
description: Governments and professional standards bodies must determine how to establish appropriate safeguards for artificial intelligence in mental health therapy. .
content: The stories about bad advice from artificial intelligence keep on coming. One eating disorder treatment chatbot gave weight loss tips. Another AI offered teenagers advice on self-harm. A third, during testing, told a person with a substance use disor... [4511 chars]

title: Eric Trump posts AI video of crowd in White House holding up his book to promote his memoir
description: The video appeared to use artificial intelligence powered by Grok to depict a crowd in a room where Eric Trump hosted a book tour event this week
content:
Eric Trump, the second son of President Donald Trump, posted an artificial intelligence-generated video depicting a crowd of supporters holding up his new memoir and cheering in a trance-like manner to promote his new book, “Under Siege.”
Taking a pa... [2534 chars]

title: Meta cutting 600 AI jobs even as it continues to hire more for its superintelligence lab
description: Meta Platforms is cutting roughly 600 artificial intelligence jobs even as it continues to hire more workers for its superintelligence lab, the company confirmed on Wednesday.
content:
The Associated Press
MENLO PARK, Calif. (AP) — Meta Platforms is cutting roughly 600 artificial intelligence jobs even as it continues to hire more workers for its superintelligence lab, the company confirmed on Wednesday.
